ARABIC: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا ٱصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who say, 'Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell, its punishment is inescapable pain.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who say: "O our Lord, avert from us the torment of Hell: Its punishment is surely continuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: who pray, "Our Lord, save us from the torment of Hell, for its torment is killing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: who pray, "Lord, protect us from the torment of hell; it is a great loss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And who submit, “Our Lord – avert the punishment of hell from us; indeed its punishment is a permanent neck-shackle.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And those who say: "Our Lord! Avert from us the torment of Hell. Verily, its torment is ever an inseparable, permanent punishment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they who say: O our Lord! turn away from us the punishment of hell, surely the punishment thereof is a lasting
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who say, 'Our Lord, turn Thou from us the chastisement of Gehenna; surely its chastisement is torment most terrible;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And who say: Our Lord! Avert from us the doom of hell; lo! the doom thereof is anguish;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who say, "Our Lord, ward off from us the punishment of Hell, for its punishment is a dreadful torment to suffer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And these who say: our Lord! avert from us the torment of Hell verily the torment thereof is perishment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Those who say, ‘Our Lord! Turn away from us the punishment of hell. Indeed its punishment is enduring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those who say, "Our Lord! avert from us the Wrath of Hell, for its Wrath is indeed an affliction grievous,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And those who say: "Our Lord! Avert from us the torment of Hell. Verily! Its torment is ever an inseparable, permanent punishment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Who say: 'Our Lord, turn from us the punishment of Gehenna, for its punishment is the most terrible;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And those who say, ‘‘Our Lord, avert from us the suffering of Hell, for its suffering is continuous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And those who say, "Our Lord, avert from us the punishment of Hell. Indeed, its punishment is ever adhering;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [25:65]   and who say, ‘Our Lord, avert from us from the chastisement of Hell. Truly its chastisement is abiding, that is, irrevocable.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And who say: Our Lord!) our Lord! (Avert from us the doom of hell; lo! the doom thereof is anguish) binding and persistent;
